system.sustained:
Has Multiple Uses: Move Object is not an Attack, Push and Throw Are.
Move Object: +20 Focus Power Test (Concentration), Psyker moves an object within range that weighs up to 10kg x Psy Rating. Cannot be used to harm people as the object moves slowly, if released in the air, it floats to the ground.
Push: +10 Opposed Focus Power Test (Attack, Concentration), Target Individual in range Opposes Focus Power Test with Strength, if fail they are thrown Psy Rating Metres back, +1m per Degree of Success on Focus Power Test.
Throw: +0 Focus Power Test (Attack, Concentration), Psyker psychically throws object within range that weighs up to 5kg x Psy Rating at enemy within range, dealing 1d10 +1 per 5kg weight of object Impact Damage.
